text: Marguerite Jacquelin (1850s – 1 February 1941) was a French flower painter. Jacquelin was born in Paris and trained with the painters Louis-Auguste Auguin, Léon Bonnat, Maxime Lalanne, and Joseph Nicolas Robert- Fleury.Marguerite Jacquelin in the RKD She showed works at the Paris Salon from 1879.Marguerite Jacquelin (XIX-1941) Jacquelin moved to Bordeaux by 1937, where she showed works along with her sister Marthe at the Salon there listing their address as "Rue Emile-Zola 2".Catalogue de la 81è exposition, Société des amis des arts de Bordeaux. title: Marguerite Jacquelin
